snippet: An Israeli education committee voted Tuesday to grant full university status to an academic center in Ariel, a large Jewish settlement, making it the first Israeli university in the West Bank.
abstract: Israeli education committee votes to grant full university status to an academic center in Ariel, a large Jewish settlement, making it the first Israeli university in the West Bank; critics denounce the decision as a political move aimed at bolstering the settlement project.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli education committee voted Tuesday to grant full university status to an academic center in Ariel, a large Jewish settlement, making it the first Israeli university in the West Bank.

headline.main: West Bank: Israel Authorizes University in Jewish Settlement
headline.print_headline: West Bank: Israel Authorizes University in Jewish Settlement
